1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da / stong phrag brgya ba bam po dang pol/
1b2('bum): smod/ sa'i khams bdag myed do/ zhes bya ba ston/ sa'i
2a1('bum): de skar de dag sa'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sa'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
2a2('bum): sa masams ca dag mya dang zhes bya bar rtag pa dang / sa'i khams myi sdug ko zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// chu'i
2a3('bum): khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / chu'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / chu'i khams bdag myed do// zhes bya bar ston da chu'i khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar
2a4('bum): stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang chu'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar
2a5('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chu'i khams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chu'i khams myi sdug
2a6('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag chu'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chu'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chu'i khams bdag myed do
2a7('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chu'i khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mye'i khams myi rtag go/
2a8('bum): zhes bya bar ston dang / mye'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston pa/ mye'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da/ mye'i khams myi'i sdug zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di
2b1('bum): skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang mye'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mye'i
2b2('bum): khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mye'i khams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mye'i khams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag
2b3('bum): mye'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mye'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mye'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mye'i khams myi sdug go/
2b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rlung gi khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston pa rlung gi
2b5('bum): khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da rlung gi kha mas bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da rlung gi khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du
2b6('bum): gang de lhur spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de su la bstand pa de dag kyang rlung gi khams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rlung gi khams sdug
2b7('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rlung gi khams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rlung gi khams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rlung gi khams
2b8('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rlung gi khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rlung gi khams bdag myed ngo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rlung gi khams myi sdug go
3a1('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// nam ma kha'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / nam mtha'
3a2('bum): khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ nam mkha'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / nam mkha'i khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa
3a3('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang nam mkha'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes
3a4('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i khams bdag/ myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i kham sa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar
3a5('bum): de dag nam mkha'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa da nganam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa da @/ nam mkha'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog
3a6('bum): ba dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rtag
3a7('bum): go zhes bya bar ston pa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston pa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
3a8('bum): myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston dacing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rnam par shes
3b1('bum): pa'i khams kyi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag byed ces bya bar rtog par
3b2('bum): 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams
3b3('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab
3b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyurar ro// ma rig pa myi rtag ko zhes bya bar stond ma rig pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / ma rig
3b5('bum): pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / ma rig pa myi smra ga go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltaraspyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes
3b6('bum): rjod de/ su la stand pa de dag kyang ma rig pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog
3b7('bum): bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa kyi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag ma rig pa myi tigra go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ma rig pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
3b8('bum): ma rig pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ma rig pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//
4a1('bum): 'du byed myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ 'du byed bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa 'du byed myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston
4a2('bum): cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du byed sdug
4a3('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'du byed myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'du byed myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog
4a4('bum): pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog par nga 'du byed bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'du byed myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha
4a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ rnam
4a6('bum): par shes pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / rnam par shes pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de
4a7('bum): su la bstand pa de dag kyang rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya
4a8('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rnam par shes pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug
4b1('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu m+b+hin da pa'i gzug
4b2('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mying dang gzugs myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ mying dang gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / mying dang gzugs bdag myed do zhes bya
4b3('bum): bar ston da/ mying dang gzugs myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de su la bstand pa de dag kyang
4b4('bum): mying dang gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mying dang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyu der ro// mying dang gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar rtog
4b5('bum): bar 'gyur ro// mying dang gzugs myi sdug ces bya ba ra rtog par 'gyur ro/ de ltar de dag mying dang gzug sa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mying dang gzugs
4b6('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mying dang gzugs bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mying dang gzugs myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
4b7('bum): phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// skye mched drug myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond skye mched drug sdug bsngalo zhes bya bar ston / skye mched drug bdag myed do zhes
4b8('bum): bya bar ston skye mched drug myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag
5a1('bum): kyang skye mched drug myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// skye mched drug sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// skye mched drug bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro/
5a2('bum): skye mched drug myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag skye mched drug myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye mched drug sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye mched
5a3('bum): drug bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye mched drug myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// reg pa myi
5a4('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar ston dang / reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / reg pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston reg pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du
5a5('bum): gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// reg pa sdug bsngal
5a6('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro/ reg pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// reg pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phagasapa mya sdug ga zhas bya bar rtag par 'gyuraro/ de ltar
5a7('bum): de dag reg pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / reg pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / reg pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas
5a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// tshor ba myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ tshor ba bdag myed do/
5b1('bum): zhes bya bar ston / tshor ba myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di ska gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la snyand pa de dag kyang tshor ba myi rtag
5b2('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshor ba myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de
5b3('bum): ltar de dag tshor ba myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshor ba myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas
5b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod pa ra 'gyur ro// sred pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston sred pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ sred pa
5b5('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston du/ sred po myi sdug go zhe sa bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/
5b6('bum): su la bstand pa de dag kyang sred pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sred pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sred pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sred
5b7('bum): pagyi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sred pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sred pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sred pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar
5b8('bum): rtog pa dang / sred kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// lend pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston
6a1('bum): len pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston le nad pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston lend pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes
6a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de su la bstan pa de dag kyang lenang pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lend pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lend pa
6a3('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lend pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag lend pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lend pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog
6a4('bum): pa dang lend pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lend pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab da kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur
6a5('bum): srid pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston srid pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / srid pa bdag myed do zhes bya b.raston da/ srid pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing
6a6('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang srid pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// srid pa sdug bsngal
6a7('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// srid pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// srid pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag srid pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
6a8('bum): srid pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / srid pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / srid pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i gzugs brtan
6b1('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro// skye ba myi rtag go zhes bya bar stonang / skye ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar gnong / skye ba bdag byed do zhes bya bar gnod/ skye ba kyi sdug go zhes bya bar sonod cing
6b2('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstadad pa de dag kyang skye ba myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
6b3('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// skye ba bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'a gyur ro// skye ba myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag skye ba myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye ba sdug
6b4('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye ba bdag myed do// zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye ba myi sdug go zhes bya bar/ rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs
6b5('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rga shi myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston pa/ rga shi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston rga shi bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ rga shi myi sdug go
6b6('bum): zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang rga shi myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/
6b7('bum): rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rga shi bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rga shi myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rga shi myi rtag go zhes bya
6b8('bum): bar rtog pa dang / rga shi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rga shi bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rga shi myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
7a1('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ sbyin
7a2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
7a3('bum): spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
7a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sbyin pa'i pha
7a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes
7a6('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad po myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
7a7('bum): tu byind pa sti rtag go zhes bya bar ston / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ tshul khrims kyi pha ro lad tu byind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston
7a8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bsta dad pa de dag
7b1('bum): kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
7b2('bum): pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya
7b3('bum): bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshul
7b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu byin du pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog/ pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha
7b5('bum): rol tu phyi nang myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar
7b6('bum): sngon dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du shing de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan
7b7('bum): pa de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
7b8('bum): phyi nad pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes
8a1('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
8a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
8a3('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da/ brtson
8a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la
8a5('bum): bstand pa de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
8a6('bum): 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar
8a7('bum): de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
8a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang po'i gzugs brnyan
8b1('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ bsam gtan
8b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
8b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa
8b4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog pa ra 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi
8b5('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag pa sam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya b.rartog pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa
8b6('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas
8b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug
8b8('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du
9a1('bum): gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mI tag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
9a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi sdug
9a3('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
9a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar to/ dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i
9a5('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyed myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ nang stong pa nyid sdug pa/ sA lo zhes bya bar ston da/ nang stong pa nyid bdag myed
9a6('bum): do zhes bya bar ston da/ nang stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa
9a7('bum): de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
9a8('bum): nang stong po nyid mye sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag nang stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
9b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nang stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//
9b2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston du/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / phyi stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston
9b3('bum): cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstanang ba de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi sto
9b4('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
9b5('bum): de ltar de dag phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ga pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar
9b6('bum): rtog pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes
9b7('bum): bya bar ston pa/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing
9b8('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa
10a1('bum): nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar
10a2('bum): de dag phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong
10a3('bum): pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ stong pa nyid
10a4('bum): stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da/ stong / pa nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing
10a5('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par
10a6('bum): 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sdug ces
10a7('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
10a8('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa
10b1('bum): nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngalo zhes bya bar ston da/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ chen po stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing
10b2('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid
10b3('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chen po sdong po nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag chen po stong
10b4('bum): pa nyid myi rtog go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chen po
10b5('bum): stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod para'agyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes
10b6('bum): bya bar ston / don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar
10b7('bum): stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
10b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par
11a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ de ltar de dag don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
11a2('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas
11a3('bum): stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
11a4('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa la spyod de zhes ngod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid
11a5('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par
11a6('bum): 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug
11a7('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
11a8('bum): tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston pa
11b1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sdug go zhes bya bar ston da cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la
11b2('bum): spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
11b3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes
11b4('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug pasngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas/
11b5('bum): stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod para'agyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
11b6('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar ston pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ mtha' las
11b7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang mtha'
11b8('bum): las 'das pa stong po nyid kyi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
12a1('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
12a2('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
12a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag
12a4('bum): go zhes bya bar ston da/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / thog ma dang / tha dang ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston
12a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya ba/ ra stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la
12a6('bum): bstand pa de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang /
12a7('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bad ste ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
12a8('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
12b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag
12b2('bum): go zhes bya bar ston/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stonapa/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myeng ngo zhes bya bar ston pa/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug
12b3('bum): go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces
12b4('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa da sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
12b5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myeg go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa
12b6('bum): nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes
12b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston
12b8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
13a1('bum): spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan ba de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
13a2('bum): 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag go/
13a3('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug pa sngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong
13a4('bum): pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab/ kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'a/ gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag go/
13a5('bum): zhes bya bar ston da chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da/ chos thams
13a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang chos thams cad
13a7('bum): stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par
13a8('bum): 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa
13b1('bum): nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab
13b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston
13b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
13b4('bum): rjend pa la spyod do zhes rjodade/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog para'agyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
13b5('bum): zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang na/ mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
13b6('bum): de ltar de dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed/
13b7('bum): do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mye dmyigs
13b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid mye rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ myi dmyigs
14a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs
14a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
14a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug
14a4('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog
14a5('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ dngos po myed
14a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing
14a7('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
14a8('bum): dngos po myed pa stong po nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rgya
14b1('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
14b2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la
14b3('bum): spyod par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston du/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar/
14b4('bum): ston / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya ba ra stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/
14b5('bum): su la bstand pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtagaces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid
14b6('bum): stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog
14b7('bum): pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar
14b8('bum): rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston pa/ dngos po myed pa'i
15a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston du/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya
15a2('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
15a3('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya
15a4('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
15a5('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag
15a6('bum): myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//
15a7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rtag go zhes bya bar ston du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag myed do zhes
15a8('bum): bya bar ston / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la
15b1('bum): bstand pa de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog pa 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
15b2('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar
15b3('bum): rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
15b4('bum): rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag go
15b5('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sku/ ga bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ yang dag par spro/ ba rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa yang dag
15b6('bum): par spong ba rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang yang dag
15b7('bum): par spong ba rnams kyi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog/
15b8('bum): par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong
16a1('bum): pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang yang dag par spong ba rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas
16a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 58/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
16a3('bum): bar ston pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
16a4('bum): la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rjes mye rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyu ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rjes sdug bsngal zhe bya bar rtog pa 'bru ro rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur/
16a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'a gyur ro// de ltar de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi rta ga go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnas
16a6('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab
16a7('bum): kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams kyi rtag go zhes bya bar smon / dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar sngon du/ dbang po rnams
16a8('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston dbang po rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de su la bstan
16b1('bum): pa de dag kyang dbang po rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
16b2('bum): dbang po rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dbang po rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang
16b3('bum): po rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dbang po rnams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// stobs
16b4('bum): rnams kyi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar son du stobs rnams dag myed do zhes bya bar ston du/ stobs rnams myi sdug
16b5('bum): go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do zhes da de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang stobs rnams kyi
16b6('bum): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams myi sdug ces
16b7('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag stobs rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams bdag myed de zhes bya
16b8('bum): bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag go/
17a1('bum): zhes bya bar ston da byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston da/ byang chub kyi yan lag
17a2('bum): rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la stand pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye
17a3('bum): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
17a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi yan
17a5('bum): lag rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rto/ ga pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi sdug go
17a6('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston
17a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / 'phags pa'i lam
17a8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la stand pa
17b1('bum): pa de dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ 'phags
17b2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'phags
17b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
17b4('bum): brgyad pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi sdug go zhes bya/ bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i
17b5('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar
17b6('bum): ston pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes
17b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
17b8('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
18a1('bum): de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i
18a2('bum): bden pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la
18a3('bum): spyod par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / bsam gtan rnams bdag myed do
18a4('bum): zhes bya bar stond/ bsam gtan rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
18a5('bum): la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang bas gtan nas myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro/ bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
18a6('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag
18a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar
18a8('bum): rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams
18b1('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston tshad myed pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston tshad
18b2('bum): myed pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar spyond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstun
18b3('bum): pa de dag kyang tshad myong pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams bdag myed ces
18b4('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag tshad myed pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar
18b5('bum): rtog pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngalalo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad myed rnam sa bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad
18b6('bum): myed pa rnams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
18b7('bum): rnams kyi rtag go zhes bya bar stond/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
18b8('bum): bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes
19a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog
19a2('bum): par 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed
19a3('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sdug ces bya bar rtog par gyur ro// de kAn de dag gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
19a4('bum): 'jug pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sku ga bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs
19a5('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed do zhe sa bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs myed pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar
19a6('bum): rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi rtag go zhes bya bar smin rna
19a7('bum): par bdad pa rnams sdug pasnam mo zhes bya bar sminadanam par bar nga tharnams bdag myed de zhes bya bar spyon/ rnam par b.rad pa rnams kyi sdug gi zhes
19a8('bum): bya bar gon dacing 'di skad du gang de sar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu rtsi dang pa la spyod de zhes rjod de yul bas nang ba de dag kyang rnami par bar
19b1('bum): pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par
19b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang rnam par thar pa
19b3('bum): rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par tha rang ba rnams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/
19b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mthar da kyis ga/ nas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya
19b5('bum): bar ston mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / mthard kyis gnas pa'i
19b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad
19b7('bum): dru gang de ltar smod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ mul bstand pa de dag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyin
19b8('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams drug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ma pa dkyis gnam pa mi snyoms pa
20a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de
20a2('bum): ltar de dag mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
20a3('bum): bar rtog pa dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi sdug
20a4('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyuraro// rnam par tha rad po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
20a5('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
20a6('bum): smond pa myed pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond rnam par tha rang po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa byed pa bdag myed do zhes bya bar
20a7('bum): smond rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa na
20a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do zhes rjod de sul bstanang pa de dag kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon myed pa
20b1('bum): mye rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/
20b2('bum): rnam par tha rang po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
20b3('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro de ltar dag rnam par tha rad po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi rtag
20b4('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par tharadapa'i sgo stong po nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
20b5('bum): rnam par thar da pa'i sgro stong pa nyid dang / ma tshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa bdag mye da do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par
20b6('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la
20b7('bum): spyod par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston / mngon par shes
20b8('bum): po rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston mngon par shes pa rnams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha
21a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mngon
21a2('bum): bar shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams
21a3('bum): lce sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag mngon par shes pa rnams me rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal pa
21a4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang mngon parashes pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi
21a5('bum): sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin
21a6('bum): rnams mr-i tag go zhes bya bar smon ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar spyon pa
21a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de sar spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol du tu byin pa la spyod don pa rjod do/
21a8('bum): la bstan pa de dag kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ ting
21b1('bum): 'dzin rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ de ltar de dag ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
21b2('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang ting nge 'dzinang rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
21b3('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// gzungs
21b4('bum): kye sgo rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond gzungs kyi sgro rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba/ ra ston / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag
21b5('bum): myed do zhes bya bar ston gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes
21b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dra pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ gzung sa rgya
21b7('bum): sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sdug ces bya
21b8('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes rtse bar rtog/
22a1('bum): pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol
22a2('bum): tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug
22a3('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar
22a4('bum): stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar s+ho/ da pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang de bzhin
22a5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mye rtag ces bya bar / ga par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'istobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur
22a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar
22a7('bum): de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin
22a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtsi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas
22b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kye rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ kye 'jigs
22b2('bum): ba rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ myi 'jigs pa rnams myi sdug
22b3('bum): go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la
22b4('bum): bstand pa de dag kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//
22b5('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag myi 'jigs
22b6('bum): pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag myed do// zhes bya
22b7('bum): bar rtog pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//
23a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi rtag go//
23a2('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo// zhes bya bar spyond/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed do// zhes bya bar ston
23a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi sdug go// zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su
23a4('bum): la bstand pa de dag kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// so/ so yang dag par rig pani sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par
23a5('bum): 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// so so// yang dag par rig pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par
23a6('bum): 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi rtag go/ zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /
23a7('bum): so mo yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
23a8('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ snying rje chen po bdag
23b1('bum): myed do zhes bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/
23b2('bum): su la bstand pa de dag kyang snying rje chen po myi rtag rjes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po bdag myed ces
23b3('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po mya sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dge snying rje chen po mye rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po sdug bsngal
23b4('bum): lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po ba dag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po myi stug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha
23b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod paragyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mye rtag go zhes bya bar ston / sangs rgyas kyi chos
23b6('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar stond/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
23b7('bum): myi sdug go zhes bya ba'i ston du cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas
23b8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi
23'a1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de
23'a2('bum): dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
23'a3('bum): 'dres pa rnams bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan
23'a4('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro// chu nad tu zhugs pa'i bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da rgyu nad tu zhu gas pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston
23'a5('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston pa/ chu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi sdug ko zhes bya bar stond cing 'di skad du gang de ltar
23'a6('bum): spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro
23'a7('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa
23'a8('bum): thas bu kyi sug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de skar de dag rgyun da tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya ba rtog pa dang / rgya nang cu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal ma
23'b1('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha
23'b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes
23'b3('bum): bya bar ston lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar
23'b4('bum): spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la despyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang la na cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar rtog
23'b5('bum): par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sku ga bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par
23'b6('bum): 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan cig
23'b7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug
23'b8('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / phyir myi 'o
24a1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar
24a2('bum): stond cing / 'di skad du gang da ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya
24a3('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong
24a4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug
24a5('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog
24a6('bum): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal la
24a7('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni
24a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes
24b1('bum): bya bar rtog par 'gyuradagra bcom pa nyid bdag myed ces za ba rtag pa mtsham pa nyid kyi lhag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de sar de dag pa
24b2('bum): bcom pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom
24b3('bum): ba nyid kyi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston / rang byang
24b4('bum): chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da/ rang byang chub bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston / rang byang chub myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston da cing / 'di skad du ga
24b5('bum): del ro slod pa 'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod do zhes dzad de/ su la bstan pa de dgakyang rang byang chub kyi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
24b6('bum): rang byang chub sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub kyi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar/
24b7('bum): de dag rang byang chub myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang chub bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byung
24b8('bum): chub myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar stond
25a1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston da lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
25a2('bum): nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar stond cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstand pa de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes
25a3('bum): pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar
25a4('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya
25a5('bum): bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug/ bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lamo gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
25a6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
25a7('bum): myi rtag go zhes bya bar ston da/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stond/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bdag myed do zhes bya bar ston
25a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la
25b1('bum): bstanang pa de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/
25b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rnam pa thams
25b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid myi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bdag
25b4('bum): myed do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan
25b5('bum): la spyod par 'gyur te// ke'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan no// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
25b6('bum): mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston na/ 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
25b7('bum): tu phyind pa snyoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang
25b8('bum): sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan
26a1('bum): gyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/
26a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa
26a3('bum): dang / sa bcu pa la kan par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms dang /
26a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang /
26a5('bum): sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms
26a6('bum): sheg/ khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa skom sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'a gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang
26a7('bum): sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brkyang ba dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/
26a8('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms shig/ khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro//
26b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa swa ba dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang /
26b2('bum): bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// nur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa snyoms shig/ khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha ro lang tu phyi nang pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'
26b3('bum): sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang /
26b4('bum): brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la ga/ nas par 'gyur ro// zhes de yang mtshan mo'i tshul dang / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stond te/ de dus kyi 'du
26b5('bum): shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom par 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan no// ke'u shi ka gzhan
26b6('bum): yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs
26b7('bum): kye bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms dang / nyan thos kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/
26b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'i shin 'gyur ro// zhes ston te/ ke'u sho ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
26'a1('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston na/ 'di ltar stond te/
26'a2('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug
26'a3('bum): par 'gyur ro// myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis de ltar myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas
26'a4('bum): te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / sangs
26'a5('bum): rgyas kyi zhi nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// zhes rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub se/ mas dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
26'a6('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la ston na/ 'di skad ston te/ rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
26'a7('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// zhes zer te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na/ shes
26'a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
26'b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston te/ tshul rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
26'b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyod pa nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
26'b3('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu smras te/ rjes su dga' bar gyis la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces rigs kyi bu 'am/
26'b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag de ltar stond cing / shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi nod to// brgya byin gyis gsold pa bcom ldan 'das
26'b5('bum): ji ltar ston na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
