26'b6('bum): tu byind pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi stond pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dra ba/ ke'u shika 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub ses
26'b7('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
26'b8('bum): sgoms shig// gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin
27a1('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa
27a2('bum): de la ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// de la gzugs nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka
27a3('bum): de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stonang to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /
27a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te
27a5('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phye nad pa sgoms shig/ tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
27a6('bum): tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis sbyong ste/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/
27a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la tshor ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag
27a8('bum): ba lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to//
27b1('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa 'di ltar
27b2('bum): stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ 'du shes myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du
27b3('bum): shes ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab
27b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa des ni/ 'dra shes rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba'i myi dmyigs so// de la 'du shes nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am
27b5('bum): myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u ni ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs
27b6('bum): brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes
27b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
27b8('bum): ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni
28a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la
28a2('bum): 'du byed nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind po'i
28a3('bum): gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
28a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgoms shig/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar
28a5('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o//
28a6('bum): dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces
28a7('bum): bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu
28a8('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
28b1('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms shig/
28b2('bum): myig myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig ni rang bzhin gyis sto/ myig gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed
28b3('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni myig rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de
28b4('bum): la myig nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab
28b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
28b6('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rna ba myi rtag ces bya bar
28b7('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa
28b8('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la na rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rna ba nyid kyang
29a1('bum): myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stonod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
29a2('bum): ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
29a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ sA myi tag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/
29a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
29a5('bum): phyi nad pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la sna nyid kyang myed na
29a6('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi
29a7('bum): ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha
29a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ lce gyi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci
29b1('bum): phyir zhen lce ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lce'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po byed pa'o// dngos po skyed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol/
29b2('bum): phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni lce rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la lce nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u
29b3('bum): shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
29b4('bum): mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
29b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ sa m+me rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/
29b6('bum): lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni
29b7('bum): lus rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la lus nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs
29b8('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
30a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
30a2('bum): rold tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ yid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
30a3('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni yid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces
30a4('bum): bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la yid nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
30a5('bum): bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i/ gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub
30a6('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
30a7('bum): bsgoms shig/ gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin
30a8('bum): ba de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya
30b1('bum): ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la gzugs nyid kyang myed na rtag pa'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
30b2('bum): me de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
30b3('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms shig/
30b4('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sgra'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o//
30b5('bum): dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces
30b6('bum): b+hA ba mye dmyigs so// de la sgra nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am mye rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
30b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
30b8('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ dri myi rtag ces
31a1('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dri'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang
31a2('bum): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dri rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la dri nyid kyang
31a3('bum): myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan
31a4('bum): myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab
31a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston du te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms na ga/ ro mya rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta
31a6('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ron rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ro'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/
31a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ro rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la ro nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ka la
31a8('bum): yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan sang
31b1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
31b2('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ reg myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ reg gi ra
31b3('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ reg rtag ces
31b4('bum): bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la reg nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i
31b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
31b6('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
31b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms shig/ chos myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chos kyi rang bzhin
31b8('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni chos rtag
32a1('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la chos nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs
32a2('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems
32a3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/
32a4('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag/ par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gau rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ myig gi
32a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
32a6('bum): tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa
32a7('bum): 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stonang to//
32a8('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
32b1('bum): 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
32b2('bum): na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
32b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rna ba'i rnam
32b4('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag/ pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
32b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i
32b6('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms
32b7('bum): shig/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i rnam par
32b8('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang
33a1('bum): yin pa de la ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am
33a2('bum): myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan mya ston to//
33a3('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ltar
33a4('bum): stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/
33a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhi na gyis stong ste/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa
33a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba
33a7('bum): myi dmyigs so// de la lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
33a8('bum): mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpe theg pa di shA kyi bu dang rigs
33b1('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rgyu
33b2('bum): rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
33b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag
33b4('bum): ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u
33b5('bum): ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gang+gAgs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs
33b6('bum): k+Shi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs
33b7('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam
33b8('bum): par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
34a1('bum): pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la
34a2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab
34a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs
34a4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ myig
34a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag pararjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi/ 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ myig gi
34a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin
34a7('bum): ba de la ni/ myog gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mye rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am mr-i rtag pa lta
34a8('bum): la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u she ka gzhan
34b1('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
34b2('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa sgoms shig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te
34b3('bum): reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/
34b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg
34b5('bum): pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa wA ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab
34b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
34b7('bum): bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di lhur ston te/ chung rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa sgoms shig/ sA'i 'dus te reg pa myi rtag
34b8('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos
35a1('bum): po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg/
35a2('bum): pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston
35a3('bum): ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
35a4('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs da kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di lta ra ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
35a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms shig/ lce'i 'dus te re ga pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin
35a6('bum): kyis stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha
35a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa
35a8('bum): 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi ston
35b1('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/
35b2('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus
35b3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
35b4('bum): pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa/ de la ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la lus
35b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am rgya rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ro/ nang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
35b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stonang to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs
35b7('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag
35b8('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos
36a1('bum): po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni yid kyi 'dus te/
36a2('bum): reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de
36a3('bum): ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
36a4('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
36a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bya b.rayang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
36a6('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa
36a7('bum): gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am
36a8('bum): mye rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u
36b1('bum): ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs
36b2('bum): kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
36b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te
36b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa
36b5('bum): gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa des ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am
36b6('bum): myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de
36b7('bum): ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
36b8('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
37a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
37a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang
37a3('bum): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces
37a4('bum): bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la sna'i 'dus te re/ dag pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u sha
37a5('bum): kade ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gang+gAgs brnyan gyi ston da to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang
37a6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston du/
37a7('bum): chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa sgoms shig/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta sheg/ de ci'i phyir/
37a8('bum): zhen/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos
37b1('bum): bo myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dra pa gang yin pa de la ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag
37b2('bum): ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs
37b3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi ston da to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
37b4('bum): pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston du te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
37b5('bum): pasgoms shig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus
37b6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin
37b7('bum): ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces
37b8('bum): bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar
38a1('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang
38a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
38a3('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag bla rjes sumanag/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ yad kyi 'dus te rig mi rkyen kyis 'o ban
38a4('bum): gyis stong smos kyi 'dus te shi rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yi/ na ba de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes
38a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni da kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la yid
38a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
38a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to//
38a8('bum): bam po gsum pa'o// // ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi
38b1('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
38b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ sa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste
38b3('bum): sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la na
38b4('bum): sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi/ dmyigs so// de la so'i khams nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te
38b5('bum): ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyibu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs
38b6('bum): kye bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs
38b7('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sgoms shig/ chu'i khams mye rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i khams ni rang bzhin
38b8('bum): kyis stong ste/ chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
39a1('bum): tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la chu'i khams nyid kyang myed napa/ rtag pa 'am gyi rtag
39a2('bum): pa lta ka la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to//
39a3('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
39a4('bum): 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ mye'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma
39a5('bum): lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mye'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa
39a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni mye'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so//
39a7('bum): de la mye'i khams nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shrI ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha
39a8('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
39b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms shig/ rlung gi khams kyi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma sa
39b2('bum): shi/ deci'i phyir zhen/ rlung gi khams ni rang bzhin gyis mdzo ste/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngom pa skyed pa'o/ dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rlom
39b3('bum): tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rlung gi khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rlung gi khams nyid kyang myed
39b4('bum): na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rig sa kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
39b5('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka ga zhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
39b6('bum): mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ nam mkha'i khams myi rtag ces bya
39b7('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o//
39b8('bum): dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba
40a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// de la nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
40a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems
40a3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sgoms
40a4('bum): shig/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis
40a5('bum): stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/
40a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rnam par shes pa'i khams
40a7('bum): nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston du te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stonang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pan
40a8('bum): gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
40b1('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dra pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ ma rig pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes
40b2('bum): su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi
40b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi dmyig so// de la ma rig pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag
40b4('bum): pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke/ 'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs
40b5('bum): brnyan gyi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i ga pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
40b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
40b7('bum): ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi
40b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am mye rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la 'du byed nyid kyang
41a1('bum): myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i
41a2('bum): gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi
41a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta
41a4('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni rang de bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang
41a5('bum): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba
41a6('bum): myi dmyigs so// de la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
41a7('bum): dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
41a8('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig mying
41b1('bum): dang gzugs kyi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma la shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ mying dang gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos
41b2('bum): po myed pa'o dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni mying dang gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces
41b3('bum): bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la mying dang gzugs nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
41b4('bum): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzug sa brnyan myi ston to/ ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kye bu dang rigs bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
41b5('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rig sa kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms
41b6('bum): shig skye mched drug myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye mched drug ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gang yin
41b7('bum): ba de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni skye mched drug rtag
41b8('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la skye mched drug nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i
42a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag nI shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs pa rnyan gyi stond to// ke'u shri ka gzhan sang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
42a2('bum): bu ma de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes ra
42a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sgoms shig reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong stereg pa'i rang bzhin
42a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ste/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni reg
42a5('bum): pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so de la reg pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te ke'u shi ka de ltar ston du
42a6('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
42a7('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di skar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
42a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang
42b1('bum): yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni tshor ba rtag ces bya ba
42b2('bum): 'am gyi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la tshor ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
42b3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
42b4('bum): ba pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms
42b5('bum): shigasred pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sred pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sred pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
42b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sred pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag
42b7('bum): ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la sred pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston po'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
42b8('bum): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to/ ke'u she ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
43a1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/
43a2('bum): lend pa myi tag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen lend pa ni rang bzhin gyis sbyong ste/ lend pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o
43a3('bum): dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni lend pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigaso
43a4('bum): de la lend pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am gyi rtag pa lha ga la yod ces ston t+te/ ke'u shi ka de sngar rgyun dpa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes
43a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de da ga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
43a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa snyoms shig/ srid pa myi rtag ces bya bar
43a7('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srid pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ srid pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni
43a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni srid pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la srid pa nyid kyang
43b1('bum): myed martag pa 'am gyi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi/
43b2('bum): stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
43b3('bum): byi nad pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig skye ba myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
43b4('bum): skye ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ skye ba'i rang bzhin ga nga yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ste/ shes
43b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin po de la ni skye ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la skye ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa
43b6('bum): lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pi gzugs brnyan myi ston to/
43b7('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu rang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar
43b8('bum): ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rga shi myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi ni rang bzhin
44a1('bum): kyis stong ste/ rga zhi'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang /
44a2('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni rga shi rtag ces bya ba 'am mye rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rga shi nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka
44a3('bum): de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
44a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
44a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rje sa su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i
44a6('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
44a7('bum): byi nang pa ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya babam gyi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so/ de la sbyin pa'i pha rol
44a8('bum): tu bye nad pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol da tu
44b1('bum): phyi nad pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
44b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar spyon te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms shig/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang
44b3('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
44b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa ra/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya ba 'am
44b5('bum): myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la tshul khrim sa kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka
44b6('bum): de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
44b7('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
44b8('bum): tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma la shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin
45a1('bum): gyis gang ste/ bzod pan ma lab tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa den dngam pa skyed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni zhes rab kyi pha rol du tu sbyin pa ste
45a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
45a3('bum): nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs
45a4('bum): brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rig sa kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
45a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sgoms shig/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
45a6('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i rang bzhin
45a7('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni brtson 'grus kyi
45a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am gyi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
45b1('bum): smyon dat+te/ ke'ug ka da kar smand pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo do dag ni shes rab kyi pha 'o la dasu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyam gyi ston / ke'u zhig kAzhan yang rigs kyi bu rung
45b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston du te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
45b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
45b4('bum): phyi nad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes
45b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba
45b6('bum): myi dmyigs so// de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu
45b7('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
45b8('bum): theg pa' ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig
46a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ shes
46a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de
46a3('bum): la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga
46a4('bum): la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to/ ke'u
46a5('bum): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar
46a6('bum): stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong
46a7('bum): pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha
46a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la nang stong pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga
46b1('bum): la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
46b2('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stod te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab
46b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ phyi stong pa nyid
46b4('bum): kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// da sa po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/
46b5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la phyi stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
46b6('bum): ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs
46b7('bum): kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi/
46b8('bum): pha rold tu phyi nad pa sgoms shig phyi nang stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste
47a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
47a2('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod
47a3('bum): ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang
47a4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems da pa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di ltar ston te
47a5('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sgoms shig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i
47a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
47a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la stong pa nyid stong pa
47a8('bum): nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i
47b1('bum): gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
47b2('bum): phyind pa 'di ltar spyond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ chen po stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
47b3('bum): na chen po stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/
47b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la chen po stong pa nyid kyang myed na/
47b5('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs
47b6('bum): brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol
47b7('bum): tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig
47b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes
48a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba kyi dmyigs ma// del
48a2('bum): don dam pa stong ba nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'as myi rtag pas ga sa med ces stond te/ ke'u ga ka de ltar stonod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
48a3('bum): tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
48a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya
48a5('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin
48a6('bum): ba de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag
48a7('bum): ces bya ba 'am gyi drug ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa
48a8('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi srin to// ke'u zhig gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma de dag byang chub sems
48b1('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig
48b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag pararjes su ma lta zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus sa byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis song ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
48b3('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'dus ma
48b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bamyi dmyigs so// de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidakyibamyed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga ya yod ces
48b5('bum): na te/ 'u shika/ de ltar gnad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dan / shes rab kyi pha ma tsu sbyin pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi yon // ke lA
48b6('bum): gzhan gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi blam de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs ni bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la zhes rab kyi pha ros su phyin dpa dus stod // chu
48b7('bum): sa kyad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams na/ ma' las 'das pa gang ba nyid gyi rtag ces bya ba dag par rjes su ma smra/ kyi
48b8('bum): 'das pa stong ma nyid ni rang bzhin gyis gang ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang len pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa ga nga yin pa de ni zhes rab kyi pa mang /
49a1('bum): tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'i myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la
49a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi
49a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
49a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pasgoms shig/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi
49a5('bum): rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
49a6('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ thog
49a7('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
49a8('bum): kon te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stonod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu gyon pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi stonang to// ga'u shig gzhan yang rigs
49b1('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes/
49b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis
49b3('bum): stong ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
49b4('bum): gang yin pa de la ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rtag/ ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am
49b5('bum): myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni na sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to//
49b6('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/
49b7('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong
49b8('bum): pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/
50a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myed na
50a2('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to//
50a3('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/
50a4('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa// sgoms shig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir
50a5('bum): zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin/ ba de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin
50a6('bum): ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so//
50a7('bum): de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
50a8('bum): tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
50b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma la
50b2('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang
50b3('bum): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so//
50b4('bum): de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka/ de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
50b5('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi lta nad to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rig sa kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
50b6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ myi dmyigs pa
50b7('bum): stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang
50b8('bum): yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa
51a1('bum): nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka
51a2('bum): de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
51a3('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/
51a4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag pa der rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myi da pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dngos po
51a5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab tu pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
51a6('bum): gang yin pa de la ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la
51a7('bum): yod ces stond te/ ke'u shrI ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan mye stonang to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang
51a8('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
51b1('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/
51b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa
51b3('bum): de la ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bu 'am myi dmyigs so// de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston
51b4('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes ra/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
51b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dra ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
51b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang
51b7('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes
51b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am gyi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
52a1('bum): nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind po'i
52a2('bum): gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha
52a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta
52a4('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag/ pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o//
52a5('bum): dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ga nga yin pa de la ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag
52a6('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston
52a7('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
52a8('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
52b1('bum): sgoms shig/ yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yang dag par spong /
52b2('bum): ba rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ yang dag
52b3('bum): par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la yang dag par spong ba rnams nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka/
52b4('bum): de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
52b5('bum): bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
52b6('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
52b7('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab
52b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa gang yin pa de la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nyid kyang myed na rtag
53a1('bum): pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston
53a2('bum): to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar
53a3('bum): ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa snyoms shig/ dbang po rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rnams
