53a4('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dbang po rnams kyir/ nga bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po mye da pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/
53a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba mye myi dmyigs so// de la dbang po nyid kyang myed na/
53a6('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u she ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston pa to//
53a7('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/
53a8('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ stobs rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs rnams ni
53b1('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
53b2('bum): gang yin pa de la ni stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la stobs nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka/
53b3('bum): de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub
53b4('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltarastond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
53b5('bum): tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ byang chub kyi yan lag rna mas myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lto shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rang bzhin
53b6('bum): gyis stong ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
53b7('bum): phyi nad pa gang yin pa de la ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag
53b8('bum): pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka
54a1('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te
54a2('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags
54a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi
54a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ da pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs
54a5('bum): de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
54a6('bum): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs
54a7('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag ces
54a8('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po
54b1('bum): myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi
54b2('bum): rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
54b3('bum): mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs ban+d+ha na myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
54b4('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ da pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ bsam gtan
54b5('bum): rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lto na ga/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhi na gyis stong ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin gang
54b6('bum): yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ bsam gtan rnams rtag
54b7('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la bsam gtan nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi
54b8('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
55a1('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ tshad myed
55a2('bum): pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad myed pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po
55a3('bum): myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni tshad myed pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces
55a4('bum): bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la tshad myed pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
55a5('bum): mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnya na myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu da nga rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'i rigs kyi
55a6('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag
55a7('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
55a8('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni gzug
55b1('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod/
55b2('bum): ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs
55b3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
55b4('bum): pasgoms shig/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma la shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/
55b5('bum): rnam par thard pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rabo kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
55b6('bum): byind pa gang yin pa de lnga ni/ rnam par tha rang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rnam par tha rad pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lha ga la
55b7('bum): yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan mye stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
55b8('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
56a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar da kyis gnas
56a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes
56a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so//
56a4('bum): de la mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
56a5('bum): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyanamyi stond to//
56a6('bum): bam po bzhi pa// / ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs
56a7('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
56a8('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
56b1('bum): myed pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnams ra thard pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de
56b2('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi
56b3('bum): rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
56b4('bum): ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzug/ sa brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs
56b5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs
56b6('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams
56b7('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab
56b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la mngon par shes pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa'i
57a1('bum): myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to//
57a2('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te
57a3('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ ting nge 'dzind rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge
57a4('bum): 'dzind rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzi nad rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
57a5('bum): phyi nad pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ting nge 'dzind rnams rtag ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la ting nge 'dzin
57a6('bum): nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs
57a7('bum): brnyan gyi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
57a8('bum): tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/
57b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi
57b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la gzungs kyi sgo
57b3('bum): nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan
57b4('bum): myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha
57b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi rtag ces bya bar
57b6('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin
57b7('bum): ba de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs
57b8('bum): ba'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/
58a1('bum): ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang
58a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol da
58a3('bum): tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ myi 'jigs pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ myi 'jigs
58a4('bum): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/
58a5('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang myed na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/
58a6('bum): ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs
58a7('bum): kye bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
58a8('bum): rolang tu phyin pa sgoms shig de/ ma ma yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni
58b1('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes
58b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang myed
58b3('bum): na rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to//
58b4('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo der dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang ri dgas kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
58b5('bum): pa 'di ltar ston te tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ snying rje chen po myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/
58b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
58b7('bum): pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la snying rje chen po nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am
58b8('bum): myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u
59a1('bum): ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar
59a2('bum): ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir/
59a3('bum): zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang
59a4('bum): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya
59a5('bum): ba myi dmyigs so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'a dris pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i
59a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
59a7('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ rgyun tu
59a8('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur/
59b1('bum): rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rgyu nad tu zhugs
59b2('bum): po'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka
59b3('bum): de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
59b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab
59b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ lan cig phyir 'o// nga ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lto shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lan cig phyir 'ong
59b6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po byed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
59b7('bum): pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la lan cig phyir 'ong
59b8('bum): bo'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
60a1('bum): tu phyinang pa'i gzugs brnyan myi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
60a2('bum): ngag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar yang
60a3('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o//
60a4('bum): dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi// nad pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa/ de la ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba 'am
60a5('bum): myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la phyir myi'o/ nga ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa/ lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston
60a6('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub seMs
60a7('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/
60a8('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
60b1('bum): dadam pa skyed pa/ dajas po myeng ba gang yin pa don gis rab kyi pa la tu phyinang dA ste/ shes rab kyi pa ba du sbyin pagang srin pa de la ni gra bcom pa nyid tag ces bya ba 'am m+me tag ces
60b2('bum): des ny-i sa k+Sha sa / shig de sa ma pa mas kyi ma gas kyi bum de ma
60b3('bum): kye pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
60b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ sgoms shig/ rang byang chub myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag
60b5('bum): bar rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bya chub ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhi na gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa
60b6('bum): gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang byang chub rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la
60b7('bum): rang byang chub nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
60b8('bum): gzugs brnyan gyi ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha
61a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgoms shig/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par
61a2('bum): rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang
61a3('bum): yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so//
61a4('bum): de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces stond te/ ke'u shi ka de lta// ra stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
61a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan myi stond to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
61a6('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
61a7('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
61a8('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam pa thams cad
61b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba myi dmyigs so// de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myed na/ rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa lnga ga la yod ces ston te/ ke'u shi ka
61b2('bum): de ltar stonang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan mye ston to// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
61b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
61b4('bum): sgoms shig/ chos gang las kyang yongs su 'da' bar ma byed cig/ chos gang la yang gnas par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
61b5('bum): phyind pa la chos gang las 'da' bar bya ba 'am/ gang lag nus par bya ba'i chos de la myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
61b6('bum): stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang
61b7('bum): yin pa de la ni blang bar bya ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba 'am/ bskyed par bya ba 'am dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yang myed do// zhes stond te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
61b8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi ston to// ke'u shika de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phying
62a1('bum): pa'i don bstand par bya ste/ ke'u shi ka de ltar stond pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ches mang du 'phel gyi rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
62a2('bum): mo snga ma dag gi ni ma yin no// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na
62a3('bum): ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bdel bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom
62a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan
62a5('bum): la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bsta nad pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
62a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
62a7('bum): pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces sgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i rnas
62a8('bum): yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can lta zhog gi/ ke'u shig gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
62b1('bum): bu mo la la zhig gis rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam
62b2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
62b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par
62b4('bum): bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/
62b5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa 'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//
62b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun
62b7('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rgyun da tu
62b8('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
63a1('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
63a2('bum): tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang
63a3('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ ldogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar
63a4('bum): bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams ma nga du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes
63a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rna mas yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rte na gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
63a6('bum): bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
63a7('bum): la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de'i snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i chus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde
63a8('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan
63b1('bum): yi ge dang ldan par gzhanas rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
63b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lcogs shig/ rdul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa' zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

69a8('bum): bzung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis
69b1('bum): shig ces smon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las phyir myi 'ong ba' rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u
69b2('bum): shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
69b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
69b4('bum): su lad pa ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan
69b5('bum): la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de ba krol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu
69b6('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lcogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
69b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shri ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las
69b8('bum): dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u she ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi
70a1('bum): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi
70a2('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
70a3('bum): ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad
70a4('bum): de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dang / ga par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rig/ sa kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zung shig/
70a5('bum): kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa 'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces
70a6('bum): bsgon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gling
70a7('bum): chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu
70a8('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol/
70b1('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
70b2('bum): phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang /
70b3('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan
70b4('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phe lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol
70b5('bum): tu phyind pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka sbyong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byurabu'i sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/
70b6('bum): ke'u shi ka sbyong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u
70b7('bum): shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /
70b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyend pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan
71a1('bum): la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
71a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs zhe/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan
71a3('bum): tan du gyis shig ces bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams myung du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u sha~M ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyuraro/
71a4('bum): ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams 'bring po sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shaM ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
71a5('bum): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis// dgra bco ma pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shaM ka de ji snyam
71a6('bum): du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom
71a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la
71a8('bum): rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yA dag pa bstan pa byas pa dang 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par
71b1('bum): gyis shig/ chongs shig lcogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams
71b2('bum): mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
71b3('bum): khams kyi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gai/ ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rdza
71b4('bum): snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am
71b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel la ma gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
71b6('bum): stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
71b7('bum): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/
71b8('bum): kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na
72a1('bum): ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka
72a2('bum): gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs
72a3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
72a4('bum): stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan
72a5('bum): la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs
72a6('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ ku na chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i
72a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
72a8('bum): 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi
72b1('bum): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod ra/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyem du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
72b2('bum): mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas
72b3('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam
72b4('bum): par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis zhe sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub
72b5('bum): par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ la bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis
72b6('bum): shig ces bsgon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par
72b7('bum): 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed
72b8('bum): pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
73a1('bum): #// nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de
73a2('bum): bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing
73a3('bum): rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs sheg
73a4('bum): lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod
73a5('bum): nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las rang / sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka
73a6('bum): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am
73a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam
73a8('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/
73b1('bum): shes rab kyi sa rna mang du phyin pa 'di don dang snang/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan sa rtswa rer brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par snyand pa byas
73b2('bum): ba dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig ldogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar
73b3('bum): bskrun pa'i zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis zhig ces bskon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa
73b4('bum): 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kre'u shig/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i se mas can rang byang chub la bkod pa la zhog gi/
73b5('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can rje snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka/
73b6('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo po/ bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom
73b7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher
73b8('bum): brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung
74a1('bum): shig kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lcogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon
74a2('bum): ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi chen
74a3('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
74a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de
74a5('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang
74a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste
74a7('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad sa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/
74a8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la gis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
74b1('bum): ke'u shig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams sod par 'gyuraro//
74b2('bum): bam po / ke'u shi ka gzhan
74b3('bum): yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ke'u shig
74b4('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
74b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge
74b6('bum): dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
74b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu
74b8('bum): phyi nang pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar bstand pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
75a1('bum): pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyu rad pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams
75a2('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par
75a3('bum): 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
75a4('bum): bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zhes bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dke'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i
75a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul
75a6('bum): ba byas pa lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na myed pa yang dag par
75a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dgra par bskul pa byas na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i chus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa
75a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
75b1('bum): tu phyinang pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang
75b2('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lcogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstun pa
75b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs bri khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab
75b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob paragyurd pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa
75b5('bum): nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi sa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gru rang pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
75b6('bum): bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi bla na myed
75b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni
75b8('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// ke'u shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
76a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
76a2('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam
76a3('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
76a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstund pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /
76a5('bum): yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs
76a6('bum): shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar
76a7('bum): bstan du pa la nan tAn byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la slob par gyur
76a8('bum): pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyi
76b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i
76b2('bum): khyod bla na myed pa'i srang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgron/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di las byung ba
76b3('bum): ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
76b4('bum): tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i se mas can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
76b5('bum): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am
76b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
76b7('bum): pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
76b8('bum): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/
77a1('bum): kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstund pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs
77a2('bum): kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar bstand pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod
77a3('bum): gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa
77a4('bum): nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod da kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis
77a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyurd pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na mye da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
77a6('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
77a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ kye'u shi ka snong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul pa
77a8('bum): byas pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shika stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bla na myed pa
77b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam
77b2('bum): gsold pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes
77b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas
77b4('bum): pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig spogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid/
77b5('bum): la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod ga/ nga gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar bstan pa
77b6('bum): la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyur pa de'i
77b7('bum): che/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab
77b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i
78a1('bum): khyod bla na myed pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
78a2('bum): 'di las byung ba ni/ sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bla na myed pa yang
78a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa
78a4('bum): de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lA la zhig gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du
78a5('bum): sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bso// da nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa ba/ com ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
78a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la
78a7('bum): rgya cher brjod de bstanang pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstanang pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
78a8('bum): phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du
78b1('bum): gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar bstun pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro//
78b2('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyurd pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis zas
78b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol
78b4('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par chu rad pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zhes bsgon
78b5('bum): ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bste/ da pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnamaso//
78b6('bum): ke'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i klung gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
78b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
78b8('bum): stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang
79a1('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig
79a2('bum): kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi
79a3('bum): tshe ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe
79a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyur pa de tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad
79a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi
79a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyurd pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/
79a7('bum): bskon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir myi ldog pa'i sa'o//
79a8('bum): ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
79b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
79b2('bum): lAm/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/
79b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan ba dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par
79b4('bum): bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/
79b5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa 'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
79b6('bum): pa ji ltar bstand pa la nun tan byed pa de'i tshe/ reg sa kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
79b7('bum): pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa
79b8('bum): de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su/
80a1('bum): rdzogs par gyur pa de'icha/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgron/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//
80a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir myi ldog pa'i sa'o// ke'u shi ka gling chen po pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
80a3('bum): can rnams phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka sbyong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir
80a4('bum): myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ke'u shi ka do ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod/ nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa bcom
80a5('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
80a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan
80a7('bum): pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig spogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la
80a8('bum): gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ji skar bstand pa la nan tan byed/
80b1('bum): ba de'i mi/ rigs kyi bu b+h+yong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu rtsong gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis
80b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par
80b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bskon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las
80b4('bum): byung ba'i ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/ mas kyi phyir myi ldog pa'i sa'o// ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can phyir myi ldog
80b5('bum): pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji ste da pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig
80b6('bum): gis phyir myi ldog pa'i sa' la bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol dpa
80b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi
80b8('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa
81a1('bum): byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig sgrogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la
81a2('bum): kyis zhig/ ji ltar bstan dra pa'i zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan byed
81a3('bum): pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams
81a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnam/ sa thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag
81a5('bum): par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha
81a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir myi ldog pa'i sa'o// ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems
81a7('bum): can phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
81a8('bum): mo la la zhog gis phyir myi ldog pa'i sa' la bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol
81b1('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi
81b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal pa dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang
81b3('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa
81b4('bum): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis ga/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe ji ltar bstand pa'i shes dab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe
81b5('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob/ par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/
81b6('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang /
81b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol
81b8('bum): tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir myi ldog pa'i sa'o// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
82a1('bum): can phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing / gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa
82a2('bum): de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la lo zhig gis phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i
82a3('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
82a4('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'a de don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher ba rjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par
82a5('bum): phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byasab dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par
82a6('bum): gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yod la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan
82a7('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha
82a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyurd pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams
82b1('bum): thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
82b2('bum): ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir myi ldog pa'i sa'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems
82b3('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag/ thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes
82b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bgro/ la zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par
82b5('bum): bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chu ba par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul
82b6('bum): bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan
82b7('bum): tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod
82b8('bum): kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
83a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams/ ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi
83a2('bum): sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bzhugs pa lta zhog gi/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
83a3('bum): pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrong zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad
83a4('bum): du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pazung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/
83a5('bum): ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan ta na du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bsta/ nad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan byed pa
83a6('bum): de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad
83a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
83a8('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka gling bzhi'i pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
83b1('bum): rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang
83b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur da te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge
83b3('bum): dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan ba dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par ba stand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
83b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstund pa'i shes
83b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyes shig/ gas kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs
83b6('bum): kye bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend
83b7('bum): pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
83b8('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rnams
84a1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/
84a2('bum): thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyurd te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang
84a3('bum): pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di
84a4('bum): skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chong sa shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig
84a5('bum): ji ltar bstand po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la na na tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe ji lta ra bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan
84a6('bum): tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe
84a7('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyu rad pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang
84a8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi
84b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
84b2('bum): kye sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ thams cad blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
84b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstanas
84b4('bum): ba byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khrod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul
84b5('bum): bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
84b6('bum): pA la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par gyurd pa de'i/
84b7('bum): tshekhyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na myed pa yang
84b8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi
85a1('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i/
