85a2('bum): phyogs re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur
85a3('bum): tede dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang
85a4('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs dkyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig
85a5('bum): kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstand pa'i she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nan tan du gyis shig
85a6('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar bstan du pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
85a7('bum): bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa su slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad
85a8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyurd pa de'i tshekhyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
85b1('bum): me de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ ke'u ni ka gzhan yang 'jam bu'i gling gi sems can ji skyed pa de dag thams cad blun myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir sti
85b2('bum): ldog par gyu ra te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sa// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi kI dang
85b3('bum): srin bu ra batshud de brtan du ba dang / bshad de bgos darnam par bye stegasas pa dang / yang dag par bganang ba byas pas de'in ba nas byang chub sems dpa' sems das chen po
85b4('bum): la zhig ga 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na myed pa yang nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la
85b5('bum): zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'a di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang
85b6('bum): du 'phel lo// kle'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyu rang pa lta zhog gi ke'u shI ka gling bzhi'i pa'i/
85b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
85b8('bum): po de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan ba dang / bshad de/
86a1('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag/
86a2('bum): myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86a3('bum): nad pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan dan/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi lam
86a4('bum): kyi sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi dke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems
86a5('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur da te/ bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la
86a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing
86a7('bum): rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na myed pa yang dag
86a8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis te/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan
86b1('bum): yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan da na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rnams bla na myed
86b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang
86b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi
86b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan bar rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par
86b5('bum): bstand pa byas pas de'i nang nas byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
86b6('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan
86b7('bum): bar rgya cher brjod de bstand na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u she ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams
86b8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
87a1('bum): thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur pa te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
87a2('bum): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstand pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /
87a3('bum): yang dag par bstan pa byas pas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lo zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
87a4('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan
87a5('bum): bar rgya cher brjod de bstan na rigs kyi bu 'am re gas kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ ke'u shi ka spyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khas
87a6('bum): kyi sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las/ phyir myi ldog par gyu rad pa lta zhig gi ke'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing / gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
87a7('bum): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
87a8('bum): dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa
87b1('bum): dang bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstand pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag
87b2('bum): myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
87b3('bum): pa 'od don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan dan/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub
87b4('bum): sems dpa' de dag ni nges pa ste/ rdzogs pa'i byangachub tu gzhol zhing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ byang chub las phyir ldog par myi 'gyur bas na/ de dag
87b5('bum): la ni gdod chos bstand kyang myi dgos kyi 'di ni khor ba las 'byung bar 'dod la/ snying rje chen pos/ man rad pa'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
87b6('bum): byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
87b7('bum): tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi
87b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de la de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha
88a1('bum): rol tu phyinang pa la gdams shing rjes su bstanang par bgyi'o// de la de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar
88a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
88a3('bum): tu nye bar gyur pa/ de lta de ltar nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar phyi stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar
88a4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand par/ bgyi'o// de lta de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gdam/ sa shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar chen po
88a5('bum): stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rje sa su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar 'dus byas
88a6('bum): stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar 'dus ma byas stong po nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
88a7('bum): nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstanang par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
88a8('bum): la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gdams shing
88b1('bum): rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstanang par
88b2('bum): bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstanang par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar
88b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de sa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la
88b4('bum): gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdams
88b5('bum): shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// stobs na mas la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o//
88b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa
88b7('bum): rnams la gradams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// tshad myed pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o//
88b8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// mtha ra kyis
89a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la gdams
89a2('bum): shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// gzungs kyi
89a3('bum): sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams la gdams shing rjes
89a4('bum): su bstand par bgyi'o// so so yang dag par rig pa na mas la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstand par
89a5('bum): bgyi'o// snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgya da la gdams shing rjes su bstand par bgyi'o// gos
89a6('bum): dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkye nad sman dang yo byad kyis kyang rjes su bzung bar bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la chos kyis bsdu ba dang / zang
89a7('bum): zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni ma lags so// de
89a8('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni yong yang de ltar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes
89b1('bum): su bstan dra pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha
89b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams shing rjes su
89b3('bum): bstan pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//
89b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o/ chen po stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan
89b5('bum): pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstanang pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong
89b6('bum): pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o/
89b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan
89b8('bum): pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dngos byed pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstanapa
90a1('bum): pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// yang dag par song/
90a2('bum): ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnaMs la gde shing rjes su bstand pa'o// dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// stobs rnams la gdams
90a3('bum): shing rjes su bstand pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o/
90a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams la gdas
90a5('bum): shing rjes su bstand pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la gdams shing
90a6('bum): rjes su bstand pa'o// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// rnam par tha rad po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang
90a7('bum): smond pa myed pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan
90a8('bum): pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gdams shing
90b1('bum): rjes su bstand pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstand pa'o// snying rje chen po la gdams shing
90b2('bum): rjes su bstan ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/
90b3('bum): ke'u shI ka de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang / yongs su skyob pa legs so// legs so//
90b4('bum): ke'u shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o// 'phags bI nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa des kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90b5('bum): chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams zang zing dang / chos kyis phan gdags pas
90b6('bum): phan gdags shing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90b7('bum): de dag las 'byung ngo // gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems myi skyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
90b8('bum): chen po sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan
91a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin rdzi rob gyid drug po 'di dag la slob pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong /
91a2('bum): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha
91a3('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa
91a4('bum): nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
91a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam
91a6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam
91a7('bum): par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon
91a8('bum): bar shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
91b1('bum): pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa ma yin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ro// bla na myed
91b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na/ rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yod par myi 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems
91b3('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang /
91b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag la yang slob la/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phye stong pa
91b5('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid sto pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas/
91b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong
91b7('bum): pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
91b8('bum): pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi
92a1('bum): yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed
92a2('bum): po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
92a3('bum): pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa
92a4('bum): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang slob pas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
92a5('bum): chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma don par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na myed pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
92a6('bum): sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gan nas kyi rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig
92a7('bum): rten rnams kyi rgyu nad chad par 'gyur ro// lA ma yin gyi ris kyang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro// lha'i ris kyang mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs che zhing mthong ba
92a8('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
92b1('bum): 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten
92b2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
92b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs su nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa kun
92b4('bum): 'khor gyi sgra rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
92b5('bum): 'gyur ro// chung snang gi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung b.ra'agyur ro tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung b.ra'agyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig
92b6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig
92b7('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnaMs 'jig rten du 'byung bar
92b8('bum): 'gyur ro// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mye che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
93a1('bum): 'gyur ro// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten/
93a2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og myin gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam shes mtha'
93a3('bum): yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'du shes myed 'du shes myin skye mched kyi lha rnams
93a4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung
93a5('bum): bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa lajig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
93a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'thu
93a7('bum): bar 'gyur ro// phyi stod pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
93a8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas
93b1('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
93b2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
93b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
93b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig
93b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba na mas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang
93b6('bum): bo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam
93b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad
93b8('bum): myed pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar
94a1('bum): 'gyur ro// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
94a2('bum): pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
94a3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gsungs rgya sgra rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ra/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mye 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig
94a4('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'ag rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
94a5('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro/
94a6('bum): theg pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// /
94a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa stong phrag brgyab bam pa / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
94b1('bum): chen po byams pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de la smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
94b2('bum): po gang yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na myed pa yang
94b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa dang / sem cad thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg
94b4('bum): pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i/
94b5('bum): bsod rnams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
94b6('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa 'di nyid rab ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o//
94b7('bum): mchog ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o gong na myed zhes bya'o// mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya'o// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// de ci
94b8('bum): phyir zhen/ 'di ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa' las zung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba' dang / bsgom pa
95a1('bum): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ste/ dran pa nye
95a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
95a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i dang / rnam par
95a4('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
95a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dag kyang bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir
95a6('bum): nye bar gnas par zad kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod/
95a7('bum): nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
95a8('bum): ba rab 'byor dgyes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi 'jig
95b1('bum): rten gyi khams grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag
95b2('bum): dang / sngo phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed/ tshad myed dpag tu myed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed/ tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan
95b3('bum): las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed/ tshad myed dpag tu myed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs
95b4('bum): myed/ tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par chu rad pa de dag dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zang sa myed/ tshad myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi
95b5('bum): khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed/ tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par/ mu rang pa de dag dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams
95b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed chud myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
95b7('bum): par gyur pa de dag dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed/ tshad myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
95b8('bum): grangs myed/ tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyurang pa de dag dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa de dag gi/
96a1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed/ tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
96a2('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed/ tshad myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
96a3('bum): par gyur pa de dag dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed
96a4('bum): tshad myed pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed tshad myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer/
96a5('bum): yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed tshad myed pa yo ngas su mya ngan las 'das par gyurd pa de dag thugs dang / po bskyed pa nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
96a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i chos/ ma nub/
96a7('bum): kye bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyinang pa drug dang ldan pa'i gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag gi/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams
96a8('bum): bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / slob pa de dag gi dge 'i rtsa ba zag pa
96b1('bum): myed pa dag dang / myi slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa myed pa dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
96b2('bum): ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / phan par bzhed pa dang / thugs rje chenang po dang
96b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs myed tshad myed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ chos gang bstand pa dang / chos bstand pa de la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa
96b4('bum): dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / sar myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
96b5('bum): skyon myed pa la zhugs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhug sa kyang rung / yongs su mya dran las 'das kyang rung
96b6('bum): ste/ de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ rjes su yi rang po'i mchog gtso bo dam pa rab phul gya nom pa bla na myed pa gong na myed pa
96b7('bum): mnyam pa myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ste/ gi rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang / ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de sems can thams
96b8('bum): cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur cig ces bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ de ltar byang
97a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa des de skad du smras te/ sems kyi rnam pa de lta bus yongs su bsngos na/ dmyigs pa gang dang / dngos po gang
97a2('bum): ngag gis sems de lta bu skyes par gyur pa'i dngos po de dag dang / dmyigs pa de dag rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmyigs su yod pa yin nam/ byams pas
97a3('bum): smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du
97a4('bum): dngos po de dag dang / dmyigs pa de dag dmyigs su yo/ da pa ma yin no// rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ ga la te de ltar dngos po myed pa dag dmyigs pa myed pas
97a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa de dag dang / de dag gi thugs da nga po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge
97a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i sa
97a7('bum): gang ji snyed pa dang / myi slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bstsogs bsdus te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mtshan mo'i tshul
97a8('bum): gyis yongs su bsngos na/ ji ltar myi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur da pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
97b1('bum): la bde zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / bdag myed pa la bdag ces bya bar 'du shes phyi nad ci log dang / sems
97b2('bum): phyi nad ci log dang / lbu ba phyi nad ci log tu gyur pa dang / myi gtsang ba la gtsang zhes bya bar 'du shes phyi nang ci log dang / sems phyin da ci log dang / lta ba phyind ci ldog tu gyurd pa de
97b3('bum): ltar de'i 'du shes phyi na ci log tu ma gyur tam/ de lta yin yang thams cad dngos po ci lta ba dang / dmyigs pa ji ltar bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i
97b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yang de bzhin/ tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa/ dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang
97b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin dra pa yang de bzhin/ gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
97b6('bum): pa shes pa yang de bzhin/ ga da na pa dang / swAdang dang / sus dang mi gyu bananas dang / sku dang dri dang / ra dang reg dang chos kyang de bzhin
97b7('bum): dang skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phye stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ stong pa nyid stong
97b8('bum): pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
98a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de
98a2('bum): bzhin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin//
98a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin
98a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin dbang po rnam sa kyang de bzhin/ stobs rnams kyang de bzhin bya chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin 'phags pa'i
98a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yang de bzhin 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin bsam gtan rnams kyang nga de bzhin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang de bzhin
98a6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin rnam par thard pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang de bzhin/ rnam par
98a7('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzungs kyi sgo
98a8('bum): rnams kyang de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang de bzhin myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang de bzhin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang de bzhin sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
98b1('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin te/ gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmyigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa yang de bzhin
98b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang de bzhin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang de bzhin brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang de bzhin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind pa yang
98b3('bum): de bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
98b4('bum): de bzhin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin don dam/ pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
98b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dor ba da ba stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang bzhin stong pa
98b6('bum): nyid kyang de bzhin/ chos thams cad spyod pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa
98b7('bum): nyid kyang de bzhin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin yang dag par spong
98b8('bum): ba rnams kyang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/ stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin
99a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang de bzhin 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ bsam gtan rnams kyang de bzhin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang de bzhin
99a2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin rnam par thard pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa
99a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang
99a4('bum): de bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang de ba zhin myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang de bzhin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang de bzhin/ sangs rgyas
99a5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po ni gang zhig yin/ dmyigs pa ni gang zhig
99a6('bum): yin/ byang chub de ni gang zhig yin/ sems de ni gang zhig yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig yin/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig mi
99a7('bum): byams pas smras pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod spyod pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos bsnyen bkur cir/ rege pa'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang / dge
99a8('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zind pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i'o chos thams cad la bslabs pa dag ni dngos po de dag dang / dmyigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas
99b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
99b2('bum): byang chub tu yongs su myi bsngo'i de dag ni 'di ltar yongs su sngo ste/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no// gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin no// mtshan
99b3('bum): ma myed pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// nyon mongs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// rnam par byang ba'i tshul gyis
99b4('bum): ma yin no// skye ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no// 'gag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' dre dag pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod spyod pa yang ma yin/
99b5('bum): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yang ma yin dge ba'i brtsa ba bskyed par gyurd pa yang ma yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zind pa yang ma yin/
99b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs par gyurd pa yang ma yin no// de dag ni dngos po de dag dang dmyigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /
99b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag la/ mtshan mar byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo bar 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab
99b8('bum): 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar bstan pa ni/
100a1('bum): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
100a2('bum): rapa'i mdun du gyi bshad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun tu gyi bzud do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
100a3('bum): pa de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun tu myi bshad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
100a4('bum): sems dpa'i mdun tu myi bshad do// nang stong pa nyid de daltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byangachub sems dpo'i mdun du myi bshad do// phyi stong pa nyid
100a5('bum): de ltar bstand pa nitheg pa la gsar du 'gas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// byin nga stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs
100a6('bum): po'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// chen po stong pa nyid
100a7('bum): de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub seMs
100a8('bum): dpe'i mdun myi bshad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan
100b1('bum): pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun
100b2('bum): du myi bshad do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstanang pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan
100b3('bum): pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi
100b4('bum): bshad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de
100b5('bum): ltar bstanang pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i nga chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstund pa ni theg pa la gsar du
100b6('bum): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du gyi bshad do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa nI/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du m+b+ha bshang //
100b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa ni/
100b8('bum): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams de ltar bstand pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/
101a1('bum): mdun du myi bshad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
101a2('bum): de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// dbang po rnams de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
101a3('bum): mdun du myi bshad do// stobs rnams de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa
101a4('bum): la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de ltar bstand pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
101a5('bum): sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// 'phags pa'i bde na ba rnams de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhu gas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do/
101a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// tshad myed pa rnams de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i
101a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do//
101a8('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu de ltar bstan pa/
101b1('bum): pa ni theg pa la gsur du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa de ltar bstan pa' ni theg pa
101b2('bum): la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// mngon par shes pa rnams de ltar bstand pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i
101b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// ting nge 'dzind rnams de ltar bstanang pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams de ltar
101b4('bum): bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du
101b5('bum): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do/
101b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi de ltar bstand pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de ltar bstan
101b7('bum): bo ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// thams cad shes pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
101b8('bum): mdun du myi bshad do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de
102a1('bum): ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa'i chos rnams de ltar bstand pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs/
102a2('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du myi bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de la dad pa tsam 'am dga' ba tsam 'am/ mos pa tsam 'am/ gus pa tsam zhig yod pa de yang myed par 'gyur ba'i
102a3('bum): phyir te/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad cing bstan to// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zind pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa
102a4('bum): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas ma po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang du phyinang pa de ltar bstand pa 'di bshad pa bya'o//
102a5('bum): bstand par bya'o// de'i mdum bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstan pa par bya'o// de'i mdun du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
102a6('bum): pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du tshul khrims kyi
102a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// stan dumo/ de'i mdun du nang stong pa nyid
102a8('bum): de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du phyi stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du phyi nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan du
102b1('bum): pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du chen po stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad
102b2('bum): par bya'o// bstanang par bya'o// de'i mdun du don dam pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstanang pa bshang par bya'o// bstanang bar bya'o// de'i mdun du 'dus byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstanang pa bshang bar
102b3('bum): bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad pa bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan
102b4('bum): pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du dor bskyed
102b5('bum): ba stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya/ de'i mdun du rang bzhin stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstanang par bya'o// de'i mdun du
102b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa bshad pa bya'o// bstan par bya'o/ de'i gas nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstun pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du myi dmyigs pa stong pa
102b7('bum): nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du ngo bo nyid
102b8('bum): stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun
103a1('bum): du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du yang dag par spong ba rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstan /
103a2('bum): par bya'o// de'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du dbang po rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o//
103a3('bum): de'i mdun du stobs rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o//
103a4('bum): de'i mdun du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de lta ra bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams de ltar bstan
103a5('bum): pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du bsam gtan rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du tshad myed pa rnams de
103a6('bum): ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstanang par bya'o// de'i mdun du
103a7('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstan
103a8('bum): par bya'o// de'i mdun du rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstan par bya'o// de'i mdun du mngon par shes
103b1('bum): pa rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du ting nge 'dzind rnams de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du gzungs kyi sgo rnams
103b2('bum): de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du myi 'jigs pa bzhi de
103b3('bum): ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du snying rje chen po de ltar bstan
103b4('bum): pa' bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du sa ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du thams/
103b5('bum): cang shes pa nyid de ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bsta/ nad par bya'o// de'i mdun du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de/ ltar bstand pa bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o//
103b6('bum): de'i mdun du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de ltar bstan po bshad par bya'o// bstand par bya'o// de'i mdun du rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams bshad par bya'o// bstand par
103b7('bum): bya'o// des ni de thos na myi 'jigs kyi snang skrag par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang / ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
103b8('bum): po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ byams pa sems gang gis rjes su yi rang zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na
104a1('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar bya ba'i sems de ni/ zad cing 'gags la myed de/ rnam par gyur pa dngos po de dag dang / dmyigs pa de dag dang
104a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang zad cing 'gags snga myed de rnam par gyur da na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems ni gang zhig/ dngos po de dag ni gang zhig/ dmyigs pa de dag ni gang zhig
104a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ ci sems kyis sems yongs su bsngo 'am de ltar sems kyis sems yongs su bsngon ni/
104a4('bum): sems gnyis 'phrad par 'gyur ba myed de/ sems kyi ra nga bzhin gang yin pa de yang yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// dgal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
104a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// bsam ga tan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// brtson
104a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha
104a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong
104a8('bum): pa nyid na dngos po myed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'dus ma byas
104b1('bum): stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po
104b2('bum): myed pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
104b3('bum): ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o//
104b4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// ya dag par spong ba rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// dbang po rnams
104b5('bum): no dngos po myed pa'o// stobs rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dngos
104b6('bum): bo myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// chang myed pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i
104b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// mthar dkris gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa
104b8('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni dngos po myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dngos
105a1('bum): po myed pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dngos po myed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dngos po myed pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhon dngos po myed pa'o//
105a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dngos po myed pa'o// snying rje chen po na dngos po myed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dngos po myed pa'o// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/
105a3('bum): ni dngos po myed pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po myed pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// rang byang chub ni
105a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni dngos po
105a5('bum): myed pa'o// zhes bya bar shes pa na de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na myed pa yang dag par
105a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// gal te de ltar yongs su sngon bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
105a7('bum): byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor nga la smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nga theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstand pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs
105a8('bum): shing sdang ba dang / skrag par myi 'gyur ram// btsun pa rab 'byor de ji ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed
105b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ ji ltar na des rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bzung zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
105b2('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la dmyigs nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
105b3('bum): smras so// ke'u shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de
105b4('bum): yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu nad pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
105b5('bum): pa de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i chu la gyis 'dzind par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
105b6('bum): phyi nad pa de yang myi dmyigs po'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de yang myi dmyig
105b7('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
105b8('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i
106a1('bum): tshul gyis 'dzind par byed nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing / nang stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ phyi stong pa nyid
106a2('bum): la spyod cing phyi stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang mtshan ma myed pa tshul kyis 'dzin tsho phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin
106a3('bum): par byed stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod cing chen
106a4('bum): po stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing don dam pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs
106a5('bum): po'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind pa ra byed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod cing 'dus byas stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma
106a6('bum): myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed 'dus ma byas s+ho/ nga ba nyid la spyod cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyi gas pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin
106a7('bum): par byed phra mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma byed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzinang par byed/ thog ma
106a8('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul kyis 'dzind par byed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
106b1('bum): la spyod cing dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs
106b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul
106b3('bum): gyis 'dzinang par byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ myi dmyigs pa
106b4('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod cing / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de ya dmyi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod cing
106b5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing /
106b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod cing dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
106b7('bum): nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
106b8('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod cing yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin
107a1('bum): par byed rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byedadabang po rnams la spyod/
107a2('bum): cing dbang po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ stobs rnams la spyod cing stobs de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i'o
107a3('bum): tshul gyis 'dzind par byed byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod cing byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed 'phags pa'i
107a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshanam myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ 'phags pa'i
107a5('bum): bden pa rnams la spyod cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa de da ga kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ bsam gtan rnams la spyod cing //
107a6('bum): bsam gtan de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ tshad myed pa rnams la spyod cing / tshad myed pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang ga mtshan
107a7('bum): ma byed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang mtshan
107a8('bum): ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed rnam par ma rang brnams la spyod cing / rnam par thar pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshus dang / mtshan ma byed pa'i chus kyis 'dzin par byed
107b1('bum): mthar kyis gnas po'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod cing / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang mtshan ma myed po'i tshul gyis 'dzin
107b2('bum): par byed rnam par thard po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la spyod cing / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa
107b3('bum): de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod cing / mngon par shes pa de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan
107b4('bum): ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed ting nge 'dzin na mas la spyod cing / ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/
107b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod cing gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyi sa 'dzind par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
107b6('bum): sa spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod cing myi 'jigs pa bzhi
107b7('bum): po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod cing / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag kyang
107b8('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/ snying rje chen po la spyod cing snying rje chen po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis
108a1('bum): 'dzind par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed
108a2('bum): po'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod cing / thams cad shes pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ lam gyi
108a3('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod cing
108a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de yang myi dmyigs pa'i chu la dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul gyis 'dzind par byed/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mos pa mang ba dang /
108a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mos pa mang ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mos pa mang ba dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mos pa mang ba dang
108a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mos pa mang ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa la mos pa mang ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la mos pa mang
108a7('bum): byinang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / stong pa nyid gang sa nyid sems pa yang ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la mos bsang ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mas bldang ba dang / 'dus
108a8('bum): byas stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la/
108b1('bum): mos pa mang ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong /
108b2('bum): pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / phyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / dngos po myed pan
108b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mos pa
108b4('bum): mang ba dang / dbang po rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / stobs rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan la ga rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam
108b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la mos pa mang ba dang / 'phags pan bden pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / bsam gtan rnam sa la mos pa mang ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams la mos
108b6('bum): pa mang ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
108b7('bum): la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la mos pa mang ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin
108b8('bum): rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mos pa mang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul mos pa mang ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang / so so yang
109a1('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi la mos pa mang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
109a2('bum): nyid la mos pa mang ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zind par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang
109a3('bum): pha rolang tu phyind pa drug po 'di dag don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par ston par 'gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang bral
109a4('bum): bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub sems da pa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / bsam gta/ na gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar
109a5('bum): stond to// byang chub sems dpo'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub sems
109a6('bum): dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / tshul khris
109a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bgyi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston
109a8('bum): to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stonang to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang /
109b1('bum): phye stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du me nas kyang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub
109b2('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / chen po stong pa
109b3('bum): nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stonang to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stonang to// byang chub sems dpa'
109b4('bum): skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / 'dus byas stongapa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chupa sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang
109b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar sta/ nang to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar/ du ci nas kyang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral
109b6('bum): bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stonang to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub ses
109b7('bum): dpe'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / rang
109b8('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar
110a1('bum): stonang to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon byed pa chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
110a2('bum): myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / dngos po myed pa stong
110a3('bum): pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub
110a4('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dngo das po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stonang to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par
110a5('bum): chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stonang to// byang chub se mas dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang
110a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar
110a7('bum): stond to/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / dbang po lnga dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ce nas
110a8('bum): kyang stobs lnga dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar
110b1('bum): ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par
110b2('bum): rgyud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bral bar gyi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / bsam gtan bzhi dang bral bar
110b3('bum): myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i smon myed par chud kyi bar du mi nas kyang / chad myed pa ba'i dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba rede sar ston do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyor myed par rung
110b4('bum): kyi bar du ci nas kyang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'ju dag pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// bya pa sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang
110b5('bum): rnam par ba rang pa brgyad dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston pa to byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kya nga mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
