110b6('bum): bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang bral bar
110b7('bum): myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stonang to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed
110b8('bum): par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stonang to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang
111a1('bum): bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar stond to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to/
111a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du rje nas kyang /
111a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ci nas kyang / snying rje chen po dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to//
111a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du ni nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang bral bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to// de la bdud kyi las rnams
111a5('bum): kyang stond par 'gyur te/ des bdud kyi las de dag thosanas 'grib pa 'am 'phel ba myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdud kyi las de dag la
111a6('bum): ngo bo nyid byed do// de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro//
111a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs de dang yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
111a8('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro//
111b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba bam po / ke'u shika gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
111b2('bum): chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang
111b3('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
111b4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa bad zhugs shing / 'tsho ba skyong ba dang / chos stonang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spros pa'i tshul chad par gyur
111b5('bum): po cheg gi sam nyams pa myi mnga' ba/ phur bor bgrod gi tsher ma rab tu bsul ba/ sred pa kun tu sbyor ba mo/ ngas su spyod pa yang dag par yongs su mkhyend pas
111b6('bum): thugs shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa de dag gi bsod nams mngom par 'du mdzad pa dang / de dag rgyal rigs che zhing ma
111b7('bum): ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum 'am/ mtshe ma 'am/ dga' ldan
111b8('bum): nama'aphrul dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dam/ tshangs ris sam/ tshangs lnga nye phan nam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor da tam tshangs chen nam snang ba 'am
112a1('bum): chung snang ngam/ chad myed snang ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba 'am/ dge ba 'am chung dge 'am/ tshad myed dge ba 'am/ dge rgyas sam che ba 'am/ chung che 'am tshad myed che ba'am/
112a2('bum): 'bras bu che ba 'am myi che ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'am/ shin tu mthong ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba 'am 'og myin gyi lha rnams sam/ sus kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig bskyed pa de
112a3('bum): ngag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa mchog phul gtso bo gya nom pa bla na myed pa gong na myed pa mnyam pa myed
112a4('bum): pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang b.rabyas te/ rjes su yi rang bar byas nas kyang sems can mas cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag
112a5('bum): par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa sa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces smras so//
112a6('bum): gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge
112a7('bum): 'dun rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad la sems shing / bsams nas rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa mchog/ phul gtso bo gya nom pa bla na myed pa gong na myed pa \u0f7f/ mnyam pa myed
112a8('bum): pa myi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
112b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ba yin/ sems phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ba yin lta ba phyind ci log tu myi 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ byams pa gal
112b2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / bcas pa de dag la sems kyang de la sangs rgyas su 'du shes par myi 'gyur/ nyan thos
112b3('bum): su 'du shes par myi 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa bar 'du shes par myi 'gyur zhing / sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la yang sems kyi 'du shes su myi 'gyur na/ de ltar yongs su sngo
112b4('bum): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba myed do// sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur pa myed do// lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba myed do//
112b5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa der/ ka dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems shing mtshan
112b6('bum): mar 'dzin da la/ mtshan mar bzung bas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyi nad rtsi log tu
112b7('bum): 'gyur ro// sems phyi ci log tu 'gyur ro// lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
112b8('bum): dang bcas pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems pa'i sems de la yang dag par sems shing / 'di ltar zad pa la zad ces bya bar shes la gang zad pa des yongs su bsngo bar myi
113a1('bum): nus te/ sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de nyid kyis chos nyid kyang de yin la chos gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de'i chos nyid kyang yin no zhes gal te
113a2('bum): de ltar yongs su bsngo na yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ste/ log pa ma yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// gal te
113a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar
113a4('bum): gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sa sa rgyas de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / de dag tu so so'i skye bo mang pos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed
113a5('bum): pa dang / chos bstand pa gang ji snyed cig thob pa dang / de dag tu lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'amo tsa dang
113a6('bum): lto 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
113a7('bum): rnams sam rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams sam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams sam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams sam/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams sam/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams sam
113a8('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams sam tshangs ris kyi lha rnams sam tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams sam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams sam tshangs chen gyi rnams sam/
113b1('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams samachung snang gi lha rnams sam/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams sam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams sam/ dge ba'i lha rnams sam/ chung dge'i lha rnams sam
113b2('bum): tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams sam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams sam/ che ba'i lha rnams sam/ chung che'i lha rnams sam/ tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams sam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams sam
113b3('bum): myi che ba'i lha rnams sam/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams sam/ shinang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams sam/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams sam/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyis/ dge bo'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed
113b4('bum): cig bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos ji snyed cig thos ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskye/ ra ba de thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul
113b5('bum): nas tshad bzung ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rab mchog/ phul dam pa gya nom pa bla na myed pa gong na rgya dang/ mnyam pa myed pa/ mye mnyam pa dang mnyam pas
113b6('bum): rjes su yi rang nas/ de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing / gal te 'di ltar chos de dag ni zad do// 'gags so myed do// rnam par gyur to/
113b7('bum): grang sa yongs su sngo ba'i sems de yang rang bzhin gyis spong ba'o zhes gal te de ltar yongs su bsngon/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// gal
113b8('bum): te 'di ltar chos kyis chos yongs su bsngo bar myi bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes la/ gal te de ltar yongs su sngon/ bla na
114a1('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam/
114a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang
114a3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// sems phyin ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// lta ba phyi nad ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
114a4('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yod sa su bsngo ba la mngon par chags pa myed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang mngon par chags pa myed do// byang
114a5('bum): chub de yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // gang la cha gas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems de yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
114a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba bla na myed pa'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de phung po dang / khams dang
114a7('bum): skye mched rnams kyis dben par shes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas dben par shes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas dben par shes brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phrin
114a8('bum): pas dben par shes bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas dben par shes / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas dben par shes sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pas dben par shes
114b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes phyi stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes chen po stong pa nyid kyis
114b2('bum): dben par shes don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes mtha' las 'das pa stong
114b3('bum): bo nyid kyis dben par shes thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ chos
114b4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/ dngos po myed pa stong pa
114b5('bum): nyid kyis dben par shes ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis dgra na bar shes dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sa dben par shes dran pa nye gzhag rnams kyis
114b6('bum): dben par shes yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis dben par shes rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ dbang po rnams kyis dben par shes/ stobs rnams kyis dben par
114b7('bum): shes byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis dben par shes 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas dben par shes 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis dben par shes bsam gtan
114b8('bum): rnams kyis dben par shes tshad myed pa rnams kyis dben par shes gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis dben par shes/ rnam par thard brgyad kyis dben par shes
115a1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus dben par shes rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon ba myed pas dben par shes
115a2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis dben par shes ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis dben par shes gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis dben par shes de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus dben par
115a3('bum): shes myi 'jigs pa bzhis dben par shes so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis dben par shes byams pa chen pos dben par shes snying rje chen pos dben par shes sangs rgyas
115a4('bum): kyi ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis dben par shes na/ rab 'a byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de bla na myed
115a5('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams
115a6('bum): bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben par shes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan
115a7('bum): 'das de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// mngon par 'du bya ba de dag ni mngon par 'du bya ba'i dngos po pas
115a8('bum): nyid kyis dben no// byang chub kyi sems de ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dben no// yongs su bsngo ba ni yongs su bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis
115b1('bum): dben no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
115b2('bum): dben no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid
115b3('bum): kyis dben no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid
115b4('bum): kyis dben no// / nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid
115b5('bum): kyis dben no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// don dam pa stong pa
115b6('bum): nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
115b7('bum): kyis dben no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// thog ma dang ma ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
115b8('bum): kyis dben no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// chos thams cad stong pa
116a1('bum): nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyig
116a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//
116a3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no/
116a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// dbang po
116a5('bum): rnams ni dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// stob sa rnams ni stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi
116a6('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngo
116a7('bum): bo nyid kyis dben no// bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// tshad byed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/
116a8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni rnam par tha rang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams na/
116b1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon ba skyed pa ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
116b2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// ting nge 'dzind rnams ni ting nge 'dzind kyi ngo bo nyid
116b3('bum): kyis dben no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// myi 'jigs pa bzhi
116b4('bum): ni myi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// so so yang dag pa ra rig pa bzhini so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dpe ngan no// snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben na
116b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no// zhes bya bar shes na/ bAng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ dben pa'i
116b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
116b7('bum): dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan 'das pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngon/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar
116b8('bum): bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji lta ba bzhin
117a1('bum): du yongs su bsngo ba 'di yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang de dang tshul mthun te/ de'i ngo bo nyid do zhes gal te de ltar shes na/
117a2('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ de ltar yongs su bsngos na 'du shes phyi nad ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// sems phyi nad ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// lta ba phyinang
117a3('bum): ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ dge
117a4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su shes na/ bla na myed pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no// 'ang das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag kyang
117a5('bum): mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma'i yul ma yin no zhes gal te de ltar sems na yang mtshan mar byed pa yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
117a6('bum): chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar na de'i 'du shes phyi nad ci log tu 'gyur ro// sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro// lha bo byi nad ci log tu 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
117a7('bum): dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag yongs su shes pa myed cing / mtshan mar gyi byed
117a8('bum): na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes byi nad ci log tu myi 'gyur ro//
117b1('bum): sems phyin da ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// lta ba phyi nang ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nga ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
117b2('bum): la mtshan mar myi byed cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba yin/ rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
117b3('bum): tu phyind pa 'di la/ thabs mkhas pa de dag la bslab par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o// shes
117b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma brtend par bsod nams/ bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// byams pas smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
117b5('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed de myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang myed de myi myigs so zhes bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag
117b6('bum): kyang myed de myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba dang / gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang myed de/ myi dmyigs so zhes bya ba 'di skyon tu
117b7('bum): smos par myi 'gyur ram snyam na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ bdag gi lus de dag
117b8('bum): kyang 'gags par gyur da dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur pa/ sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 'gags par gyur pa na/ bdag ni
118a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing / rnam par rtog pa lta de bzhin gshegs
118a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni de ltar mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la rjes su dgyes pa dang / mngon par bsngags pa ma mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
118a3('bum): de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mtshan mar byas shing / rnam par rtog ste/ dmyigs pa ni de'i dmyigs pa chen por myi 'gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
118a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pas/ mye dmyigs shing mtshan ma myed par bya ste/ yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
118a5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes can gyi yongs su bsngo ba don che bar ma gsungs so// de ci'i
118a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug can zug rngu can te/ 'di ltar dper na/ kha zas gso da pa/ kha dog phun sum 'a tshogs pa/ dri phun sum 'tshogs pa zhig yod kyang
118a7('bum): dug dang 'dres par gyur dran kha dog dang dri dang / ros yid du 'ong ba yang yod mod kyi 'ond kyang dug can du zad na/ de la skyes bu byis pa'i ngang tshul can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i ngang tshul
118a8('bum): can ni mtha' bar sems te/ des mos na yang la dog dang dri dang ro zhim par tshor mod kyi/ sdug bsngal ba dang sdug bsngal kyi rnam par smind par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'dis log par rig pa dang /
118b1('bum): log par shes pa dang / log par bslabs pa la la don ma rtogs myi shes shing / 'di skad du ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom

137a3('bum): ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do//
137a4('bum): gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dad// sa po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// chos gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi
137a5('bum): khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ya nga ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan
137a6('bum): ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste dngos po myed pa ni dngos
137a7('bum): bskyed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// myig gi rnam par shes pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi yongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das
137a8('bum): pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la
137b1('bum): rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang

149a6('bum): kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang mo yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan
149a7('bum): ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do// ga la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos
149a8('bum): po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// ting nge 'dzin gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed po'i khams kyi khongs su
149b1('bum): chud pa mo yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar
149b2('bum): myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so//
149b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/
149b4('bum): da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul/ lam dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la rang bzhin myed do//
149b5('bum): gang rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ ngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo ba rgyu nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po ga
149b6('bum): dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi 'ongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ dra s+phar b+hu
149b7('bum): sangs yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul las/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa/ derje'i phyir zhen/ de dag sa rang bzhim byed do// gangs rang bzhin myed pa
149b8('bum): na sa bgyu/ dem btsung pa no sa bdas su ba rdzom gas pa tshan pag pa/
150a1('bum): myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'o//

150a3('bum): myi nus so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang mo yin/ ma
150a4('bum): 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ dedag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yo ngas su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la/
150a5('bum): rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yod sa su bsngo bar myi nus so// snying rjen po gang dag 'dod
150a6('bum): pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/
150a7('bum): de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar gyi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sa rang bzhin myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/ dra
150a8('bum): po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po gang dag 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed
150b1('bum): pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de dag ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de dag ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs

150b3('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin pa/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/

150b8('bum): myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni/
151a1('bum): 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir/

151a6('bum): khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan mo'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi

151a8('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin da ltar
151b1('bum): byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan mo'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po
151b2('bum): myed pa ste/ dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i/

151b5('bum): bar myi nus so// myi nyam pa'i chos nyid gang 'dod pa'o/ khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs mye dpa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa

152a1('bum): de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la rang bzhin myed do// gang rang bzhin myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa ste/
152a2('bum): dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// zhes de ltar shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i bsngo ba drug myed pa yin te/ bdud rtsi'i mthar phyind par
152a3('bum): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngon de ni log par yongs su bsngo ba
152a4('bum): yin gyi yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no// log pa de'i yongs su bsngo ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sa bsngags pa ma yin te/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
152a5('bum): 'das rnams kyis myi bsngags pa'i yongs su bsngo ba des ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par mya 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs
152a6('bum): su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi
152a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// phye stong pa
152a8('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// chen po stong po nyid yongs su rdzogs
152b1('bum): par myi 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro//
152b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyi 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyi 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyi gyu

152b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro//
152b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa myi 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams
152b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya
152b7('bum): 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

153a1('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// rnam par thard pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// mthar dkyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par
153a2('bum): myi 'gyur ro// rnam par thar da po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro//

153a4('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro//
153a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzog sa par myi 'gyur ro// gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul
153a6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs
153a7('bum): su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / nang
153a8('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
153b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
153b2('bum): par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
153b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid

153b5('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
153b6('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
153b7('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan
153b8('bum): lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur
154a1('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs rjes su rdzogs
154a2('bum): par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar
154a3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin
154a4('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzung sa kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par
154a5('bum): myi 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzog sa par myi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ba zhi yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po
154a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ba ba des ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par myi 'gyur/ sems
154a7('bum): can rnams yongs su sbyin par myi 'gyur ro// gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyurd pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par ma gyur pa de ni/ bla na myed pa
154a8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang
154b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos
154b2('bum): nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ de ltar yongs su bsngos na yongs su bsngos pa'i rab tu 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid
154b3('bum): des bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar bya'o zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la bka' stsal pa
154b4('bum): rab 'byor da legs so legs so// rab 'byord de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma myed pa'i
154b5('bum): tshul dang / dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i tshul dang / kund nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par
154b6('bum): byang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang /
154b7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis stond pa ni/ rab 'byor da khyod stond pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byor da gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen
154b8('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can de dag thams cad dge bal bcu'i las kyi lam thob par gyur pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyurapa/ tshad myed pa bzhi thob par gyur
155a1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur da mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyu rad na/ rab 'byor dade ji snyar du sems sems can de dag gi bsod nams
155a2('bum): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs
155a3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor da de ltar rigs kyi bu
155a4('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o//
155a5('bum): gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang stong gsu ma gyi stong pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can
155a6('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyu nad tu zhugs par gyur da/ lan cig phyi 'o gyur gyir kyi 'ong ba krung dgra 'gyus de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can rgyu nang tu zhugs par gyur
155a7('bum): ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyurd pa dang phyir myi 'ong bar gyurd pa dang / dgra bcom par gyu rad pa de dag thams cad la rnam 'tsho'i bar du gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal
155a8('bum): dang nad kyi rkye nad rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas bkur bstir byas phudud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am
155b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab
155b2('bum): 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa myed par/ yongs su bsngos pas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo//
155b3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa yongs su bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o//
155b4('bum): gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems
155b5('bum): can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgya sa su gyur da te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la lo zhig gis gos dang / bsod snyoms dang
155b6('bum): mal stand dang / nad kyi rkyend rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas bkur bstir byas phu dud du byas/ ma chod par byas na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems
155b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo po/ bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
155b8('bum): bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa myed pa'i yongs su sngo bas yongs su sngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang
156a1('bum): du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o//
156a2('bum): phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
156a3('bum): rgya khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
156a4('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod
156a5('bum): snyoms dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtse dang yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas bkur bstir byas phu dud du byas
156a6('bum): mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod
156a7('bum): pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal snund dang nad kyi rkye nad rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal
156a8('bum): pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
156b1('bum): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang /
156b2('bum): bsod snyoms dang mal stand dang nad kyi rkyen ci dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/ bkur bster byas/ phud dud du byas/ mchod par byas te
156b3('bum): bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur du byas pa dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis
156b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang nad kyi rkyenang rtsi dang / yod byed mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi
156b5('bum): bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byadaHmas cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / byang shar gyi
156b6('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang /
156b7('bum): bsod snyoms dang mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad mang pos bskul pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas phung dud du byas/ mchod par byas
156b8('bum): te bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
157a1('bum): thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang mal stan dang nad kyi rkye nad rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i
157a2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas bkur bstir byas phud dung du byas mchod par byas ste bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi
157a3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang mal
157a4('bum): stan dang / nad kyi rkye nad rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i
157a5('bum): yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / nub byang gi'i phyogs kyi mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
157a6('bum): thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang mal stan dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
157a7('bum): snyed du rim gror byas bkur bstir byas phu dud du byas mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
157a8('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos dang / bsod snyoms dang mal stan dang nad kyi
157b1('bum): rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas phud dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur
157b2('bum): byas pa dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang
157b3('bum): gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang nad kyi rkyenang rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas mchod par byas te/
157b4('bum): bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rig sa kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
157b5('bum): lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis te/
157b6('bum): ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dpe bgyi bar yang dka'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la/ gzugs mchis su lags na ni
157b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang shong bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da legs so legs so// de de bzhin te
157b8('bum): skad du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor dade bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo bas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
158a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rab
158a2('bum): ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab
158a3('bum): 'byor da chags pa myed pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des/ brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro/
158a4('bum): bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi cha ra yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye/ bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang
158a5('bum): nye bar myi 'gro'o// grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang rgyur yang myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i bcu'i
158a6('bum): las kyi lam dang ldan par gyu rad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur
158a7('bum): pa de dag ni myi gos pa'i 'du shes can no// de ltar sems can thams cad chund tu zhugs par gyu rang pa dang / sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / sems can
158a8('bum): thams cad phyir myi 'ong bar gyurd pa dang / sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyurd pa dang / sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su mu rad pa de dag la gos dang bsod snyoms dang /
158b1('bum): mal sman dang / nad kyi rkyen ci dang so byad mang pos rim gror byed bkur bstir byed/ mu dud du bred mchod par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang / dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can/
158b2('bum): de nas rgyal po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang / 'grogs te thal mo sbyor nas dga' ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol
158b3('bum): kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan
158b4('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul dang bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyi das/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par dza gas pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing / ci nas kyang
158b5('bum): gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su
158b6('bum): bsngo ba shi nad tu che'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gi ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang / 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /
158b7('bum): lA rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lA rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lA rdzas kyi ba dan mang po
158b8('bum): thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs spos dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang
159a1('bum): lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtord to
159a2('bum): rab tu gtorang to// mngon par gtor nga to// 'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pas/ dmyigs
159a3('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyed pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na
159a4('bum): nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su
159a5('bum): bsngo ba shi nad tu che'o//
159a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / de nas lho'i bu rab mtshe ma mtshe ma'i bu stong phrag du ma dang
159a7('bum): 'grogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lA rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lA rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lA rdzas kyin
159a8('bum): bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi gdug
159b1('bum): spos dang lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / swa rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lA rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
159b2('bum): lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// rab tu gtor to// mngon par gtor to// 'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems

159b4('bum): dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yod sa su sngo zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su
159b5('bum): sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna mas kyi yongs su bsngo ba shi nang tu che'o// de nas lha'i bur ba tu dga' ldan dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang /

159b7('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / spa rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs te/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos dang /
159b8('bum): lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi drug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
160a1('bum): lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// rab tu gtor to// mngon par gtord to// 'di skad kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub

160a7('bum): lA rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lA rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lA rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis

160b1('bum): rnams thabs mkhas pas dmyigs su ma mchis po'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
160b2('bum): byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing ci nas kyang / gnyis su myi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis ma lags par yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
160b3('bum): kyi yongs su bsngo bzhin du tu che'o// de nas lha'i bu ce rna mas byed kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/ la rdzas kyi me tog dang / spa rdzas kyi bdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi
